title: Kalaw Lagaw Ya
summary: Kalau Lagau Ya, Kalaw Lagaw Ya, Kala Lagaw Ya ([kala(u) la…°au ja]), or the Western Torres Strait language (also several other names, see below), is the language indigenous to the central and western Torres Strait Islands, Queensland, Australia. On some islands, it has now largely been replaced by Torres Strait Creole.
